translated: Sí, Gray dijo que debería quedarme por aquí y ver el sitio.

original: Honestly, the money I make barely covers materials, but I love it.
translated: Sinceramente, el dinero que gano apenas cubre los materiales, pero me encanta.

original: I just have to grade a few more of these puppies and we are on our way.
translated: Solo tengo que classificar unos cuantos más de estos cachorros y estamos en nuestro camino.

original: This person has proven that they have exceptional creativity and style.
translated: Esa persona ha probado que tiene un excepcional creatividad y estilo.

original: This person is destined to be a rising star here at Donovan Decker.
translated: Esa persona está destinada a ser una estrella en alza en Donovan Decker.

original: And now Miss Shaw is on her way to your house to visit your sickbed.
translated: Y ahora la Srta. Shaw está de camino a tu casa para verte enferma en la cama.

original: Remember. We must impress this Harrods style director at any cost.
translated: Hay que impresionar a este director de estilo de Harrods cueste lo que cueste.

original: For your own sake, I suggest you answer these questions truthfully.
translated: Por su propio bien, le sugiero que conteste a las preguntas con la verdad.

original: Do you have any idea how we might get in touch with someone from the British Government?
translated: ¿Tienes idea de cómo podemos ponernos en contacto con alguien del Gobierno Británico?

original: A week ago, I was standing in line, holding a tuna baguette, queuing up for easyJet.
translated: Hace una semana, estaba en una fila, sosteniendo una baguette de atún, haciendo cola en EasyJet.

original: They asked me a bunch more questions and suddenly it was all, you know, tea and toast.
translated: Me han hecho un montón de preguntas más y de repente eso fue todo, ¿sabéis? , té y tostadas.

original: Be honest, kid, you were worried about her finding your porno collection.
translated: Se honesto, chaval, estabas preocupado porque ella encontrara tu colección de porno.

original: I wonder what people would really make of all this back home?
translated: Me pregunto que haría la gente de todo esto al volver a casa.

original: You two stay here, if the driver comes back, just all stay with the car, all right?
translated: Vosotros dos quedaros aquí, si el conductor vuelve, quedaros todos en el coche, ¿de acuerdo?

original: Drugs deals have been financing dodgy US foreign policy for years.
translated: La drogas han financiando la sospechosa política exterior de los EEUU desde años.

original: Which is why removing you is an easy piece of damage limitation.
translated: Por lo que acabar con ustedes es lo más fácil para minimizar daños.

original: I want you to tell the girls that I love them both very much...
translated: Quiero que les digas a las niñas lo mucho que las quiero a las dos...

original: Our Mortal Kombat victoryNclosed those portals What closes can open again
translated: pensé que con nuestra victoria habíamos cerrados los portales.

original: You would never letNone of your humans die Trade me for Johnny Cage
translated: Tu, nunca dejaras que alguno de tus preciados humanos mueran... cambiame por Johnny Cage.

original: Your planet and OutworldNhave begun to merge into one Think of it as hell on earth
translated: nuestro mundo y Outworld comenzaran a unirse en un solo mundo.

original: He resurrected Sindel to keepNthese portals open indefinitely
translated: EL resucito a tu madre para mantener los portales indefinidamente abiertos.

original: If the Elder GodsNlearn of our plot we shall bothNsuffer the consequences
translated: Si los dioses ancianos sabe de nuestro plan, ambos sufriremos las consecuencias.

original: Until the sixth dayNhas passed we can take no chancesNwith Rayden and his mortals
translated: antes que el sexto día haya pasado, no podemos correr riesgos con rayden y sus mortales.

original: the mergerNof the realms grows closer More of the earthNwill be destroyed
translated: cada hora que pasa mas se fusionan los reinos muchas partes de la tierra serán destruidas

original: I proved myselfNas the protector of Sindel Your orders are mine to follow
translated: me he desempeñado bien como protectora de la reina Syndel cumpliré tus ordenes.

original: The energies they wasteNwith their sniveling I would use to capture souls
translated: las energías que estos gastan en hablar, yo las gastaría en buscar almas para usted.

original: You are not a leader Find that power inside you Feel your animality
translated: Tu no eres un líder encuentra el poder dentro de ti siente tu lado animal

original: I need to use the rest roomNI got no toilet tissue I got metal on my hands!
translated: Tengo que ir al baño ni tengo papel higiénico, tengo metal en mis manos ...

original: I have comeNto the eternal palace because your sacred rulesNhave been broken
translated: Vengo al Palacio Eterno porque han violada las leyes secretas.

original: Better because I was expectingNa team of fighters I hear fightersNat war with each other
translated: Mejor ,porque espero buenos luchadores pero no luchen entre si.

original: How could you believeNthe ruination of the temple would not jeopardize our plan?
translated: como pudiste pensar que destruyendo el templo de los Dioses no pondría en riesgo nuestros planes?

original: It was necessaryNto convince the mortals their only hope lie in Outworld
translated: Era preciso convencer a los mortales de que a la única esperanza que les queda está en Outworld.

original: You seem confident that SindelNwill capture them in your trap on my soul
translated: Estás convencido que Sindel capturará a Rayden y sus mortales.

original: I will rallyNthe extermination squads and prepare for victory
translated: Voy a preparar a los pelotones de exterminio a preparar la victoria.

original: The mergerNwill soon be complete All your friends will be dead
translated: muy pronto la fusión estará completa y todos tus amigos estarán muertos.

original: Rayden and his mortalsNhave fallen for my trick and failed to stop us
translated: Rayden y sus mortales caerán ante mi no conseguirán detenernos.

original: Kitana your love can break the holdNKahn has over your mother and close his portals to earth
translated: Kitana, tu amor puede anular el poder de Kahn sobre tu madre y cerrar los portales .

original: I have prayed for the day when our love will bring us together again
translated: Rece para que llegase este día en que nuestro amor volviese a unirnos.

original: The only ones we can trustNfrom here on out are humans not even Rayden
translated: A partir de ahora solo podemos confiar en los humanos. En nadie mas ni siquiera Rayden.

original: My father is an Elder God And only they can bestowNsuch a marking
translated: los dioses ancestrales solo ellos pueden otorgar esas marcas.

original: You will mount a defenseNaround my newest temple Prepare for Rayden to makeNone last attack
translated: Tu irás a defender mi nuevo templo debes estar preparada para el último ataque de Rayden.

original: If you fail me I will feedNyour rotting corpse to the worms!
translated: Porque si esta vez me vuelves a fallar, tu cadáver será comida de los gusanos.

original: Your hallowed positionNatop the worm pile appears to be most tenuous
translated: tu actitud de fracaso esta en tu camino pareces tener menos importancia.

original: Then you shall die with the restNof your pathetic human race! Finish him!
translated: Entonces morirás con el resto de tu patética raza humana, matenlos!

original: I warned youNthere would be consequences for breaking the sacred rules
translated: te advertí que habría consecuencias al violar las reglas sagradas.

original: They wrapped my shirt around some food, hid it in the woods.
translated: Envolvieron un poco de comida con mi camisa y la escondieron en el bosque.

original: But he grabbed me here, pushed me up against the bunk, and then he backed off.
translated: Pero me agarró aquí, me empujó contra la cama, y luego se retractó.

original: He probably dragged it off into there and hid it or something.
translated: Probablemente la arrastró hasta allá y la escondió o algo.

original: The first night in the woods by myself was pretty awesome, actually.
translated: Es mi primera noche en el bosque solo, fue realmente impresionante.

original: If you mash them up, you can make like a paste and make a pancake out of it.
translated: Si las trituras, puedes hacer como una pasta y hacer unas tortitas con ellas.

original: Something more permanent would be nice, you know, even a rock would be better.
translated: Algo mas permanente estaria bien, tu sabes, hasta una roca seria mejor.

original: I get approached by Daniel, and basically started accusing me of hurting Carolina.
translated: Daniel se me aproximó, y basicamente empezó a acusarme de herir a Carolina.

original: When I saw that look in his eyes, I just felt that I needed to take a step back.
translated: Cuando vi esa mirada en sus ojos, sentí que tenía que dar un paso atrás.

original: It seems like everybody at camp was convinced that I was the person that hurt her.
translated: Parece que todos en el campamento estaban convencidos que fui yo quien la hirió.

original: Deputy Ahn said that she has some files that she needs to get to the Vice President.
translated: El ayudante de maganer Kang dijo que tenía un documento para darle al vicepresidente.

original: Here I thought I was going to go home like the rest of the normal people.
translated: Pensé, por primera vez, que iría a casa con un hombre que es una persona real.

original: The way her husband was smiling was even scarier than the ghost herself.
translated: La cara sonriente de su esposo fue más horrible que los fantasmas.

original: What do you think it was that she saw... when she left her shoe and ran away?
translated: ¿Qué crees que vio para salir corriendo dejando su zapato?

original: I have a feeling that she saw something that made her very angry and upset.
translated: De alguna forma, siento que vio algo realmente enfurecedor e injusto.

original: Go find out what injustice he did to her, and get revenge for her, too.
translated: Ve y revela la injusticia, dale lo que se merece por venganza de ella.

original: Your intuition that only sees and hears useless things holds no value to me. Zero.
translated: Si sólo ves fantasmas que no son de ayuda, entonces no vales nada para mí.

original: I think that tissue box is dead now after having completed its mission.
translated: Creo que la caja de pañuelos cumplió su misión y ha muerto.

original: What if I fall too deep in sleep and have it taken from me like the last time?
translated: Aunque duerma profundamente, los espíritus vendrán a molestarme.

original: Our summer revenue figures are doing great. Kingdom is really climbing up.
translated: Las ganancias de este verano han sido muy altas. ¡Kingdom lo está haciendo bien!

original: That poster was made when we thought Yi Ryung was going to marry the soccer player.
translated: Tomamos esta foto cuando Tae Yi Ryeong iba a casarse con ese futbolista.

original: I have to keep going with her so that no one will suspect me when she has an accident.
translated: Tengo que estar con ella para que nadie después sospeche del accidente.

original: Once that old lady is dead... who do you think is going to get all this?
translated: Cuando esa vieja muera, ¿quién crees que será el dueño de todo esto?

original: The woman that Tae Gong Shil went after earlier is the employee at the Dahlia shop.
translated: Por cierto, la mujer que seguía Tae Gong Shil es una empleada en Dahlia.

original: She was so shocked and flustered that she lost her shoe along the way.
translated: Estaba tan sorprendida, que huyó sin percatarse de que había perdido un zapato.

original: The police brought it to me and told me that they found it at the scene of the accident.
translated: La policía me lo trajo diciendo que lo habían encontrado en la escena.

original: Could you still say the same thing if your wife was here watching over you right now?
translated: ¿Dirías esas palabras aunque tu esposa estuviera aquí con nosotros?

original: I picked it out of the trash after you threw it away at the hospital.
translated: Lo recogí después de que usted lo tirara en la basura del hospital.

original: He went against his contract and signed a contract with Giant as well.
translated: Ya había firmado un contrato de traspaso al centro comercial Giant.

original: Was that why you watched over him at the hospital? Because of your own suspicions?
translated: Pero, ¿no lo estuviste observando porque también estabas preocupado?

original: I went and retrieved it because I went down the wrong path and saw what he did.
translated: Me equivoqué de camino y vi la escena, así que los recogí.

original: So, if you continue to stay around me... then I guess you may get to see her again?
translated: Si siempre estás a mi alrededor, puedes verla de nuevo, ¿no?

original: What you said about you liking me because I come from a rich family... did you mean it?
translated: ¿Es cierto que sólo te gusto porque soy de una familia rica?

original: Even though I need you need the partnership, is it okay to be getting married like this?
translated: Aunque la necesite por sus negocios, ¿está bien que se vaya a casar así?

original: Even though it shocked me to my core, I accepted what I needed to accept.
translated: Aunque me impactó hasta la médula, acepté lo que tenía que aceptar.

original: I want to live my life churning the wheel up here, which works just fine for me.
translated: Quiero vivir mi vida usando esto, que funciona bien para mí.

original: Does he have to be the only one whom you can run to when you want to hide?
translated: ¿Tiene que ser el único a quien acuda cuando quiere ocultarse?

original: I barely got him to allow me near him after clinging onto him all this time.
translated: Apenas conseguí que me dejara estar cerca después de aferrarme todo este tiempo.

original: Your lousy lies makes me really wonder if you really want to keep your secret hidden.
translated: Tus mentiras hacen que me pregunte si de verdad quieres mantener oculto tu secreto.

original: Anyways, I called you in here to have you take a look at this.
translated: De todas formas, te llamé aquí para que eches un vistazo a esto.

original: I know that people think that this thing is precious and valuable.
translated: Sé que la gente piensa que esta cosa es preciosa y valiosa.

original: This is nothing but a jug that was used to carry water around in.
translated: Esto no es más que un jarro que se utilizó para llevar agua.

original: I was just trying to find a nice roundabout way of telling you that.
translated: Solo intentaba encontrar una manera amable de decírtelo sin rodeos.

original: This was originally just a water vase that was used to carry water.
translated: Fue originalmente sólo un jarrón que se utilizó para transportar el agua.

original: You could get yourself into big trouble if you handle this pottery the wrong way.
translated: Podría meterse en graves problemas si maneja esta cerámica de forma equivocada.

original: Ghosts are the only ones that I can count on to understand me at times like this.
translated: Los fantasmas son los únicos con los que cuento para que me entiendan.

original: President Joo is marrying the heiress of Sejin Construction.
translated: El Presidente Joo se va a casar con la heredera de Construcciones Sejin.

original: Mi Kyung, who works at the Kingdom hotel said she saw him throwing an event for her.
translated: Mi Kyung, que trabaja en el Hotel Kingdom dijo que lo vio hacer un evento para ella.

original: To be honest, even if they did fool around, their level is just way too different.
translated: Para ser sincera, si estaban tonteando, su nivel es bastante diferente.

original: You need to see Tae Gong Shil for yourselves to come to your senses.
translated: Tienen que ver a Tae Gong Sil ustedes mismas para recuperar la cordura.

original: Tell your aunt that the pottery is dangerous and she needs to be careful.
translated: Dígale a su tía que es peligroso y que tiene que tener cuidado.

original: Are you going to continue to argue that Kang Candy is the one you like?
translated: ¿Vas a seguir argumentando que Dulce Kang es quien te gusta?

original: I once read a comic about a wolf that met a lamb on a stormy day.
translated: Una vez leí un cómic sobre un lobo que se encontró a una oveja un día de tormenta.

original: The wolf needed to catch and eat the lamb in order to survive but he fell in love with the lamb.
translated: El lobo tenía que atraparla y comérsela para sobrevivir... pero se enamoró de la oveja.

original: If I accept your proposal... does it mean that Sejin Construction will have a new owner?
translated: Si acepto tu proposición... ¿significa que Construcciones Sejin tendrá un nuevo propietario?

original: I prefer the simplicity of the white porcelain over the flash of celadon.
translated: Prefiero la simplicidad de la porcelana blanca sobre el destello del celadón.

original: Since I met President Joo... things have gotten much better.
translated: Desde que conocí al Presidente Joo, las cosas han mejorado mucho.

original: I noticed how my life changed once I found a little room to breathe in.
translated: Me di cuenta cómo cambió mi vida cuando encontré un poco de espacio para respirar.

original: President Joo can give you something that I can never give you.
translated: El Presidente Joo puede darle algo que yo nunca podré darle.

original: I bet that bit of news will become the number one searched topic on the web.
translated: Apuesto a que esa noticia será el tema número buscado en la web.

original: If I was to become your candy girl, you can just tell me to get lost at any time.
translated: Si me convierto en su Candy puede decirme que desaparezca en cualquier momento.

original: Are you waiting for me to turn into a lamb and offer myself up to you?
translated: ¿Estás esperando que me convierta en una oveja y me ofrezca a ti?

original: The truth is... I saw a very scary looking lady ghost on my way up here.
translated: La verdad es que, vi una fantasma muy aterradora cuando subía.

original: If it makes you uncomfortable, I can just hold onto one of your fingers.
translated: Si le hace sentir incómodo, puedo agarrarme solo a uno de sus dedos.

original: Did you see any other ghosts while I was away on my business trip?
translated: ¿Viste otros fantasmas mientras estuve fuera en mi viaje de negocios?

original: Chief Secretary Kim, please make sure that everyone gets this note.
translated: Secretario Kim, por favor asegúrate de que todo el mundo tenga esta nota.

original: I want the building to look like a giant mirror that will blind everyone with its beauty.
translated: Quiero que el edificio parezca un espejo gigante... que ciegue a todo el mundo con su belleza.

original: I heard that girl over there stayed at a hotel suite with President Joo.
translated: Escuché esa chica de allá se alojó en una suite de hotel con el Presidente Joo.

original: Earlier, you tell me that I was being disgusting for using the bathroom often.
translated: Antes me dijiste que era desagradable por ir al baño con frecuencia.

original: I heard that all our friends from high school are getting together for dinner.
translated: Me enteré de que nuestras amigas de secundaria se van a reunir para cenar.

original: But it looks like his current engagement might really work out this time.
translated: Pero parece que su compromiso actual realmente podría funcionar.

original: Too bad that the curse got lifted when you go into the picture.
translated: Qué mal que la maldición se quitara cuando entraste en escena.

original: When those two come head to head... who do you think will win at the end?
translated: Cuando los dos se ven frente a frente, ¿quién cree que ganará al final?

original: A reservation has been made for you and Park Seo Yeon for tomorrow.
translated: La reserva ha sido hecha para usted y Park Seo Yeon para mañana.

original: Whenever I try to do anything, she tells me how tacky and uncouth I am.
translated: Cada vez que intento hacer algo me dice lo chabacano y ordinario que soy.

original: According to Gong Shil... she said that we need to break this thing if any problem occurred.
translated: Según Gong Sil... tenemos que romper esta cosa si ocurría algún problema.

original: But people are going to think that you told him to break off his engagement.
translated: Pero la gente va a pensar que le dijiste que lo rompiera para romper su compromiso.

original: I think I finally get how others view you as they see you standing next to him.
translated: Creo que por fin entiendo cómo te ven los demás al verte junto a él.

original: But I finally realized how others view Gong Shil as she stand by his side.
translated: Pero finalmente me di cuenta de cómo me ven los demás por estar a su lado.

original: When a group of girls gets together... they all brag about their boyfriends, right?
translated: Cuando un grupo de chicas se reúnen, todas presumen de sus novios, ¿verdad?

original: I guess breaking that vase really was the right thing to do like she said.
translated: Supongo que realmente romper ese jarrón como ella dijo fue lo correcto.

original: Since this was just a business arrangement and we both profit quite a bit from it.
translated: Ya que solo era un arreglo de negocios y ambos nos beneficiamos un poco de ello.

original: I hope that you can break off the curse before your next engagement.
translated: Espero que puedas romper la maldición antes de tu próximo compromiso.

original: After the kidnapping incident, Joong Won lived abroad in other countries.
translated: Después del secuestro, Joong Won vivió en el extranjero en otros países.

original: Three years in L.A., four years in New York, and three years in China.
translated: Tres años en Los Ángeles, cuatro años en Nueva York, y tres años en China.

original: She wrote to say that she was moving back to Korea in her last card to Maria.
translated: En su última carta a María dijo que se mudaba a Corea de nuevo.

original: Do you believe... that this woman is watching over President Joo?
translated: ¿Cree usted que esta mujer está vigilando al Presidente Joo?

original: I just received news that your father has arrived at the hotel.
translated: Acabo de recibir la noticia de que su padre ha llegado al hotel.

original: Would you like to stay and speak to him about how your father is doing?
translated: ¿Le gustaría quedarse y hablar con él acerca de cómo le va a su padre?

original: And it turns out that the man in that car was the president of Kingdom.
translated: Y resulta que el hombre del auto era el Presidente de Kingdom.

original: When I told him how sad and lonely I was, he finally allowed me to be near him.
translated: Cuando le dije lo triste y solitaria que era, finalmente dejó que me acercara a él.

original: He helped me out whenever I was struggling with something and he remained by my side.
translated: Me ayudó cuando yo estaba luchando por algo... y permaneció a mi lado.

original: He even rented out a whole swimming pool at his hotel to throw me a surprise event.
translated: Incluso alquiló una piscina entera en su hotel para hacerme un evento sorpresa.

original: He said he came to get her so that she can take responsibility.
translated: Dijo que vino por ella para que asumiera la responsabilidad.

original: Can you really remain by my side and not want for anything else?
translated: ¿Realmente puedes quedarte a mi lado y no querer nada más?

original: Can you really go away on your own once you figured out how to be by yourself?
translated: ¿Realmente puedes irte sola cuando averigües cómo estar sin mí?

original: I will still run right into your arms if something scary jumps out at me.
translated: Todavía correré a sus brazos si algo aterrador salta sobre mí.

original: I think I should just be a sun that only shines for those who are already dead.
translated: Creo que soy un sol que sólo debería brillar radiantemente para los muertos.

original: I only want to remain as a brilliant sun only for those ghosts.
translated: Yo quiero brillar radiantemente y ser popular sólo con los fantasmas.

original: I thought Tae Gong Shil would be fine as long as I handled everything.
translated: Creí que Tae Gong Sil estaría bien siempre y cuando yo me encargara de todo.

original: Even if you were to follow her there, she has a two hour head start on you.
translated: Aunque la siga hasta allá, ella le lleva una ventaja de dos horas.

original: You managed to get her to stay, but what are you going to do now?
translated: Se las arregló para que se quedará, ¿qué va a hacer ahora?

original: Did you get me off that plane just so that you could practice your acting on me?
translated: ¿Me bajaste del avión para que pudieras practicar tu actuación?

original: Because things need to get better for you, and you have to become safe and happy.
translated: Porque las cosas tienen que mejorar para ti, y tienes que ser feliz y segura.

original: And when you appeared, you were like a safe haven she could escape to.
translated: Y cuando usted apareció, fue como un refugio seguro al que podía escapar.

original: Gong Shil is considering stepping out on her own away from you.
translated: Gong Sil está considerando salir por su cuenta, lejos de usted.

original: You used to say that you were just grateful to have someone like you.
translated: Solías decir que estabas agradecida con que le gustaras a alguien.

original: Then do you think President Joo could have the same misunderstanding?
translated: ¿Entonces cree que el Presidente Joo también tiene el mismo malentendido?

original: Did the blunt and brazen sun all of a sudden become a moon of purity?
translated: ¿El descarado sol de repente se volvió una luna de pureza?

original: Initially, I felt comfortable to cling onto you as my defensive shield.
translated: Al principio, me sentí cómoda aferrándome a usted como mi escudo defensor.

original: I even paid her a huge amount of money so that she never comes back again.
translated: Le pagué demasiado para que no regresara. Imposible que ella le dijera algo.

original: I was really touched after I heard the story about the two of you from Deputy Ahn.
translated: Estaba muy emocionado después que la Secretaria Ahn me contara la historia.

original: President Joo went through all that trouble to bring you back and make you stay.
translated: El Presidente Joo pasó por todo ese problema para traerte de regreso.

original: Ms. Tae Gong Shil, you should give it a rest and stop playing so hard to get, okay?
translated: Srta. Tae Gong Sil, deberías dejar de hacerte la difícil, ¿de acuerdo?

original: Even the thought of never being able to see him again... makes me feel completely empty inside.
translated: Hasta el pensar que no podré verlo... me hace sentir vacía por dentro.

original: The last time I followed this kid, I almost caused Joong Won to die.
translated: La última vez que lo seguí, casi hago que Joong Won muriera.

original: After threatening me to come with the necessities after a fake hospitalization... and she sleeps?
translated: Después de amenazarme para que trajera comida después de su actuación... ¿y ella duerme?

original: I was prepared for something even more drastic with you being the black whiskered whale and all.
translated: Estaba preparado para algo más drástico... siendo tú la Ballena Negra Bigotona.

original: I was attempting to organize my thoughts in order to renegotiate with you.
translated: Intentaba organizar mis pensamientos para renegociar contigo.

original: I hate these fat noodles that sits in a bowl of this hot broth.
translated: Odio esos fideos grasosos que están en un plato de caldo caliente.

original: I have horses, golf courses, swimming pools, and tennis courts.
translated: Tengo caballos, campos de golf, piscinas y canchas de tenis. Tengo todo.

original: In other words, you could say that I have a lifetime membership to all those things.
translated: En otras palabras, podrías decir que tengo una membresía de por vida en esas cosas.
